title: If You Think Kufuor And Nana Addo Can Resolve NPP Problems Then Trash Council of Elders
text: The opposition New Patriotic Party [ NPP ] is battling an internal skirmish which has led to the suspension of their National Chairman, Paul Afoko. The ‘Elephant ’ fraternity National Executive Committee ( NEC ) last Friday unanimously voted to
